body:
I was in the middle of downloading regeit through this forum post: https://www.badlion.net/forum/thread/8101?page=1


And after doing all the instructions I restarted my CPU only to find out I lost complete control over my sound system. It won't read my microphone or headset for anything, Minecraft, TS, Spotify. Please help :^)


Note: I was talking with Sessp about my problem and found out I put the "TCPNoDelay & TcpAckFrequency" in the actual interfaces folder. After a restart of my computer it still isn't fixed.



Thanks,
Josh
body_tagged:

title: regedit Help!

replies.body:
"I was in the middle of downloading regeit "

I hope youre kidding it doesnt seem like you have any idea of what youre talking about. You dont install regedit, its already there. and if u have a mac then you WONT ever have it

As well as archy states lots of times in the post that if you cant follow simple instructions then dont do what is given on the post


lol.
